title: Employee Capacity Report
subTitle: This is a subtitle
description: Developed an employee capacity report scheduler to automatically send reports to supervisors every Monday

skills: Programming: Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL
Cloud Services: AWS Elastic Beanstalk, Azure Entra ID
Other: Agile Methodology, SOLID principles, MVC pattern
jd: Developed the solution to focus on employee capacity based on working days, excluding weekends, holidays, and day-offs, and deployed it to AWS.
Conducted unit testing and integration testing.
